Returns: true if the ViewStub has replaced itself with the inflated layout or false if not
isInflated().Description: Returns true if the ViewStub has replaced itself with the inflated layout or false if not.

Returns: the root View of the layout replacing the ViewStub once it has been inflated. null is returned prior to inflation
getRoot().Description: Returns the root View of the layout replacing the ViewStub once it has been inflated. null is returned prior to inflation.

Returns: the ViewStub in the layout or null if the ViewStub has been inflated.
getViewStub().Description: Returns the ViewStub in the layout or null if the ViewStub has been inflated.

Returns: the data binding associated with the inflated layout once it has been inflated. null prior to inflation or if there is no binding associated with the layout
getBinding().Description: Returns the data binding associated with the inflated layout once it has been inflated. null prior to inflation or if there is no binding associated with the layout.

ClassDesc: This class represents a ViewStub before and after inflation. Before inflation, the ViewStub is accessible. After inflation, the root View of the inflated layout will be available. If the inflated layout has data binding, the ViewDataBinding for the inflated View is accessible.
